titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1579) to prohibit Members of Congress from purchasing or selling certain investments, and for other purposes.
Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1579) to prohibit Members of Congress from purchasing or selling certain investments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: This resolution provides rules for consideration of H.R. 1579 (prohibiting members of Congress from purchasing or selling certain investments).
